articles.description: The wantaway Manchester United star made headlines last week with his two-part bombshell interview with Piers Morgan on TalkTV. The 37-year-old didn't hold back on his interview.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo has broken yet another record, as he has become the first person ever to reach 500million followers on Instagram.

articles.author: Liam Llewellyn
articles.title: Ronnie O’Sullivan sends warning to Mark Allen after remarkable UK Championship win - The Mirror
articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan has issued a word of warning to Northern Ireland's Mark Allen as the new world number five claimed his maiden UK Championship title in York yesterday
articles.content: Ronnie OSullivan has sent a warning to Mark Allen following the 36-year-olds UK Championship victory. The Rocket watched on as his rivals sparkling form continued to win his maiden title at the event… [+2761 chars]

articles.title: Fans pile in to Morgan Freeman over World Cup opening ceremony gig - Daily Mail
articles.description: The opening ceremony featured a rousing speech from Freeman, but the tournament has been plagued with controversy over Qatar's treatment of foreign workers and its human rights record
articles.content:
Morgan Freeman has incurred harsh criticism after hosting the opening ceremony of the 2022 World Cup in Qatar amid concerns over the nation's human rights record.
The tournament, whose opening cerem… [+7916 chars]

articles.title: England fans hunt for a £12 pints in Qatar ahead of Iran World Cup 2022 opener - Daily Mail
articles.description: Thousands of England fans have descended on Qatar and have managed to sniff out £12 pints ahead of  the first match of the World Cup.
